icmp Struct Reference

#include <netinet/ip_icmp.h>

Detailed Description

ICMP protocol header structure.


Data Fields

u_char icmp_type
 Type of message.
u_char icmp_code
 Type sub code.
u_short icmp_cksum
 Ones complement header checksum.
u_long icmp_spec
 Type specific information.
